abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Joao Sousa in third round of Miami Open tennis tournament; other matches noted.

headline.main: Novak Djokovic Bounces Back at Miami Open

snippet: Novak Djokovic took a nasty spill during a tight first set but then pulled away and beat João Sousa, 6-4, 6-1, in the third round at the Miami Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic took a nasty spill during a tight first set but then pulled away and beat João Sousa, 6-4, 6-1, in the third round at the Miami Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
